# 58415_fseek

```shell
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
cmake --build .
cmake --install .
./dist/bin/fseeking-demo test.bin
```

Should output something like:

```text
   Writing test data to file 'test.bin'...
   -- Done.

a) Set cursor to the beginning of record 2 and read the first
   byte...
   -- The first byte of record 2 is 2.

b) Set cursor to the beginning of the last record and read the
   first byte...
   -- The first byte of the last record is ?.

c) Set cursor to the beginning of the 5th record, move
   forward 1 record, and read the first byte...
   -- The first byte of the 5th record is '5'.
   -- The first byte of the next record is '6'.

d) Move backward 2 records and read the first byte...
   -- The first byte of the record 2 records back is '4'.
```

For reference, here is the test data that is written to `test.bin`:
```text
# show contents of test file in hex editor:
$ xxd test.bin
```
